front.title: Diff-Serv-aware MPLS Traffic Engineering Network Management Information Base Using SMIv2

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the ManagementInformation Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols inthe Internet community. In particular, in response to customerdemands and strong input from vendors, it describes managed objectsfor modeling and managing Diff-Serv-aware MPLS Traffic Engineering [DSTEREQS][DSTEEXTS].
